page.title: 09RAVENSWORTH GOLF CLUB
page.content: {Ravensworth Golf Club}was established in 1906. In 1906 it was a nine hole course, but became eighteen holes in 1915.The trees are still small,the course is still changing today. The membership was less than 100 in 1906. It has grow and today, in 1985, there are 350 men, 75 junior members, and a ladies section of 26. The Officials in 1985 are Rt. Hon. Lord Ravensworth, President, who owns the course, the captain is Mr.T.Wilson and the Secretary is Mr.J.H.Ford. At the club there is a professional golfer who runs a shop and gives golf lessons to members. There is a club house where members can drink and talk.There is a television room as well as changing rooms and showers.outside there is a putting green for the players to practice on.
